bibl.title: The Egyptian Temple and Settlement at Naukratis.
bibl.note: Attempts to settle the issue of the purpose of the so-called Great Enclosure (or Great Temenos) and places it within the context of an Egyptian town.

bibl.title: British Museum Studies in Ancient Egypt and Sudan

bibl.seg: SPENCER A.J., The Egyptian Temple and Settlement at Naukratis.

British Museum Studies in Ancient Egypt and Sudan 17 (2011) pp. 31-43, 14 figg. n./bl. et coul. [Accessible en ligne, en téléchargement gratuit: < http://www.britishmuseum.org/research/online_journals/bmsaes/issue_17/spencer.aspx >.]
Attempts to settle the issue of the purpose of the so-called Great Enclosure (or Great Temenos) and places it within the context of an Egyptian town.
